member.name: M:Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentWarrantRepository.GetAllPaymentWarrants
member.summary: Gets all PaymentWarrants from the database.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that returns an enumerable of SystemUser entities.

member.summary: Gets a PaymentWarrant by its Guid identifier.
member.param: The Guid identifier of the PaymentWarrant.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that returns the PaymentWarrant entity with the specified Guid identifier, or null if no such entity exists.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentWarrantRepository.GetByReferenceNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a PaymantWarrant by its referenceNumber.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that returns the PaymantWarrant entity with the specified referenceNumber, or null if no such entity exists.

member.summary: Adds a new PaymentWarrant to the database.
member.param: The PaymentWarrant entity to add to the database.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that returns the added PaymantWarrant entity.

member.summary: Updates an existing PaymentWarrant in the database.
member.param: The PaymentWarrant entity to update in the database.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that returns the updated PaymntWarrant entity.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentWarrantRepository.DeletePaymentWarrant(System.Guid)
member.summary: Deletes a PaymentWarrant from the database by its Guid identifier.
member.param: The Guid identifier of the PaymentWarrant to delete.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that represents the operation.

member.name: M:Payment.API.Data.Repository.IPaymentWarrantRepository.DeletePaymentWarrantByReferenceNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a PaymentWarrant from the database by its username.
member.param: The referenceNumber of the PaymentWarrant to delete.
member.returns: An asynchronous task that represents the operation.
